index_basic: DROP INDEX IF EXISTS movies_rated on movies
index_on_id_subfield: DROP INDEX IF EXISTS movies_year on movies
index_on_subfield: DROP INDEX IF EXISTS award_wins on movies
index_or_query_with_override: DROP INDEX IF EXISTS movies_rated on movies

index_or_query_with_override.query: SELECT * FROM movies WHERE awards.wins = 3 OR rated = 'APPROVED'
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE awards.wins = 3 OR rated = 'APPROVED'
SELECT * FROM movies USE DIRECTIVES '{"#index":null}' WHERE awards.wins = 3 OR rated = 'APPROVED'

index_id_and_field_with_or_basic: DROP INDEX IF EXISTS movies_rated on movies

index_id_and_field_with_or_basic.query: SELECT * FROM movies WHERE _id.year = '2001' OR rated = 'APPROVED'
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE _id.year = '2001' OR rated = 'APPROVED'
SELECT * FROM movies USE DIRECTIVES '{"#index":null}' WHERE _id.year = '2001' OR rated = 'APPROVED'

index_complex_queries: DROP INDEX IF EXISTS movies_rated on movies

index_complex_queries.query: SELECT * FROM movies WHERE _id.year = '2001' OR rated = 'APPROVED'
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE _id.year = '2001' AND rated = 'APPROVED'
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE _id.year = '2001' OR rated = 'APPROVED'
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE _id.year = '2001' AND rated = 'APPROVED'
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE runtime > 80 OR rated = 'APPROVED'

index_string_contains: DROP INDEX IF EXISTS movies_plot_text on movies

index_string_contains.query: SELECT plot FROM movies WHERE CONTAINS(plot, 'love') LIMIT 10
SELECT plot FROM movies WHERE CONTAINS(plot, 'love') LIMIT 10

validation_test.query: SELECT * FROM movies WHERE rated = 'PG' LIMIT 5

index_and_count_validation: DROP INDEX IF EXISTS movies_runtime on movies

index_and_count_validation.query: SELECT * FROM movies WHERE runtime > 150 LIMIT 100
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE runtime > 150 LIMIT 100
